website_summaries.verdict: If you need a gaming mouse pad that was made to last, PECHAM’s extremely wide and ultra-smooth model rolls up without warping, is easy to clean, and constructed with a strong cloth material that won’t fray after extended usage.
pros: Super-smooth surface promotes slick gliding motions
cons: While the thick rubber base will secure the mouse pad in place, it may have a strong smell that will likely linger for a few days

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great mousepad for the price. Cat approves of it too :)
customer_reviews.author: Camdyn Bordelon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and perfect size for narrow tables.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to replace bf’s old @ss mousepad. Perfect size for a narrow table. Good quality, smooth surface and sits at the desk flat. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaBanana

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent mouspad. I've had mine for a year and it is still holding up great! Washable too - great bonus. Love this mouspad so much I bought a second one for my room at college. Great deal for the price. Mice just glide over it. Smooth as butter.
customer_reviews.author: DavePlays

customer_reviews.title: Budget gaming mouse pad, good for it's price
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a little over $8, which I can't complain about. However if you're thinking long term for long hours of gaming I would say keep looking. This replaced my old mouse pad that i had for years and it was overdue because i didn't realize how clean a new one was until i received this. At first it was pretty happy, the quality is there, but I don't think it's thick enough and soft enough for the wrist after long hours.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice wide mouse pas
customer_reviews.text: I’m ambidextrous, so sometimes I use my right hand to use the mouse when my left wrist gets tired. I can never find a mouse that was long enough that I didn’t need to flip from left to right. This mouse fits that need. I can switch to left or right without messing with my mouse or moving my laptop around. My only gripe is that the mouse pad has a slit on the back. I didn’t feel like returning it because no one will see the cut. Overall, this mouse pad is functional and works well with the optical mouse.
customer_reviews.author: C. Abe

customer_reviews.title: You must have one of these if your desk gets cold in the winter!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking around for years for some solution to the fact that desks in colder weather act as heat sinks, sucking the heat out of your body through your wrists. I've tried fingerless gloves (which make typing REALLY slow) and other various things that all failed. This, on the other hand, is a really good solution, and doubles as a mouse pad. The edges are sticked so that, unlike most mouse pads, they don't quickly become frayed. I'm happier with this than just about anything I've ordered on Amazon for years.
customer_reviews.author: iconoclast

customer_reviews.title: I love this mat -- great if you have a desk with a glass top
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat. I have a desk in my office that has a glass top and my optical mouse wont work on it. I was using a small mouse pad but it was alway difficult to keep the mouse in that small of an area, it seemed that I was consantly pickupi the mouse and recentering on he pad. This mat is simialr to the mouse pad but lays across most of my desk. It provides a great non-slip surface for both my mouse and keyboard and has [lenty of room to spare. Plus it just looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Pad from PECHAM
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one of these and each one has met the quality standards I've come to expect from PECHAM. This one will be used in my workshop and will see how it holds up to the extra abuse compared to the other ones being used at a work desk and a gaming station. The edges are all nicely sealed and I've seen no imperfections like some other brands I've tried in the past. Plus the sale price made it a great deal that I couldn't pass on.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellently RAD MousePAD!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for almost two years. This has been the best mouse pad I've ever owned. The quality is fantastically superb with the fine nit stitching all the way around, to the very washable mat itself. When you first get it, it will roll at one end for a bit. Just place it upside-down for a while with something heavy on it. This will mold into shape in no time. I've had to wash it a few times due to unforeseen 2 year old mayhem, and it still looks almost new. Also, this mouse pad reminds me of a very dear friend, so that makes it even better.
customer_reviews.author: Husbeard

customer_reviews.title: chemical assault on the nose
customer_reviews.text: The fit and functionality of the product was great. However I could not stand the chemical smell of it. I returned the item and will look for something else that isn't so stinky.
customer_reviews.author: beans4me

customer_reviews.title: Flawless giant pad
customer_reviews.text: The precision is better than I've experienced before thanks to the matte BLACK material. It was a dream to clean with bleachy dishwater, dried quickly, and there was no brightening or staining. The decal didn't even crack or come off. Surprisingly easy for autoimmuners like me to disinfect and layout for use. I cleaned this and had it in use with my Chromebook and new mouse only 2 hours later. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: James Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn't order this mouse pad because there are a lot of reviews that says it smells bad. I ended up taking my chances because the price was so cheap and thankfully mine didn't smell at all. It is a really big mouse pad which is great because there is plenty of room for my mouse and keyboard. Now I have a good mouse pad and my keyboard doesn't slide all over my desk anymore
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent desk/keyboard/mouse pad
customer_reviews.text: Extended pad was just what i was looking for. The size fits my desk perfectly, just make sure you measure your desk twice before purchasing. Been using this daily for a couple months and it's still holding strong. With the stitched edges, I do not see any types of fraying. It does have a cushion feel to it which I like, compared to the thin mousepads. The bottom does have some tack to it, so it doesn't move around that easily. Been using a redragon m901 and I have not encountered any types of sensor/tracking issues. Got this on a lightning deal, so the value and quality was an good buy for me.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Yu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for home office "desk"
customer_reviews.text: I had to set up a home office due to a COVID-19 stay-at-home policy. Having sold my nice desk years ago, I was left with a fold-up table. The slick surface was difficult to work on, so I wanted a mouse pad large enough to fit my keyboard. However, too wide, and it would interfere with my docked laptop, too deep ans it would interfere with my monitor stand. This one came in at just the right size and at a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Knight Fam

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice, slips a bit, Printed logo is Sticky
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a large mousepad as my Polyurethane finished desktops are very slick. I am not annoyed enough to return the product, but would probably not buy again: Pros: It's large It's a mousepad It's decently comfortable Cons: The edge binding is raised, I would have preferred something without a "lip" at the edge The printed "PECHAM" logo in the corner gets sticky with heat, sweat, etc and is uncomfortable, as such I have mine sitting on the desk 180 degrees to how it "should" be. Some of the stitching on the edge is already unraveling after a month of use.
customer_reviews.author: The Days

customer_reviews.title: Better than thumbnail shows
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Hell i should give it 4 stars cause i would've got 3 instead of 1 if i knew it said "pecham" really small and not huge like the tacky thumbnail picture displays (and i wouldve saved a couple bucks for buying 3 at once). However the product is quite good. Soft, ive cut it with little to no unraveling/fraying, tracks well. It doesnt stay in place 100% on my glass desk tray, but not enough to be an issue, will try things like carpet stay padding to see how that works.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Jones

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value, excellent product
customer_reviews.text: After seeing all the other desk mat options from the big name companies like Corsair and Razer that cost 5 times more; I decided to take a chance on this one. I am not at all dissatisfied. It's a great desk mat. I can fit my Logitech G810 keyboard, Grifiti wrist rest, and still have TONS of room for my Mionix Castor mouse to move around. The mat stays firm in place, and the mouse tracks wonderfully on its surface. It also feels very well made. Honestly, after using this I don't know why you'd spend so much more for one of the bigger name brands.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended, but will not flatten.
customer_reviews.text: The pad is spacious. I use this at work, where my mechanical keyboard and mouse live on it. It's thick. responsive and comfy. However, the left edge won't lie flat. I've left books on it on my off days (flipped it over and tried that way, too). I've had it for about 3 weeks and it should've flattened out, by now. I've informed the seller of this and they weren't very helpful (just told me to do what I've already done for the last 3 weekends). So, if having a permanently curled edge is a deal-breaker for you, shop elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Really great mousepad.
customer_reviews.text: Got this mousepad for my gaming desktop and this one was the cheapest at the time. It’s a pretty big mousepad and is pretty comfortable. Haven’t had any issues with it yet but I haven’t washed it yet either but I wouldn’t mind buying it again if I had to.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Grabbed this on sale. Great option for the money. Large enough to accommodate keyboard and leave plenty of real estate for mouse work. It does arrive rolled fairly tight which prevents it from laying flat. I took an iron to it and gently rolled in the opposite direction to flatten it out - worked perfectly. I'm not crazy about the logo - would prefer it all-black as the logo is pretty meaningless, so one star down for that.
customer_reviews.author: C. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming surface!
customer_reviews.text: Great bang for your buck. The cloth top is nice and smooth and the rubbery underside makes sure it doesn't slip around where you place it. Large enough to fit a full sized keyboard and your mouse with plenty of space left. The water proofing is a nice touch in case you're like me and have a single coaster in the entire house. Condensation off my water bottles and sodas haven't left any noticeable effects or defects. If you're into the cloth style mouse pad as opposed to the hard plastic ones, save yourself some cash and buy this - it's great for what you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice! Good Quality, Well-Made
customer_reviews.text: Huge! I had this on my wish list for some time, maybe 6 months, before deciding, Yes, I really wanted it. The Pecham pad is replacing a clattery bamboo mini cutting board I've been using on my desk for the past couple years as a mouse pad. Pad sits flat, no curling, looks great. Wireless keyboard stays in place while wireless mouse slides effortlessly. Also appreciating the waterproofing as I will put drinks on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason K.

customer_reviews.title: so I was a little disappointed that it was so thin as compared to my ...
customer_reviews.text: 3mm isn't that thick, so I was a little disappointed that it was so thin as compared to my previous mouse pad. So what I did was slip my old mouse pad underneath and voila, everything was better. I like the size of it, just wish it was a tad thicker, like my womans ass. UPDATE: 7/22/17 So I received an email from customer service inquiring about my disappointment with the thinness of the mat. After several emails, they made me happy with the resolution. Kudo's to their customer service for really caring about having happy customers! So I have increased my initial rating of 3 to a 5 because of the way they handled it. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Ruined My Desk’s Finish
customer_reviews.text: RUINED MY DESK FINISH!!! Had this on my wood desk for 9 months. Just moved it and found it has turned the wood finish yellow and won’t come off. I’m going to have to completely refinish the the surface of the desk to fix this. Not sure what the are using to keep the pad from moving, but it will discolor your warned. You’ve been warned!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jp be me

customer_reviews.title: Very good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is my first XXL mouse pad. Before I was using a small one that my keyboard covered half of because of the way my desk is set up. It would get annoying when trying to play an fps game and then continuously hitting the keyboard. With this mousepad, I have enough room for both my keyboard and ample room for my mouse. My mouse glides over the pad nicely and I have had zero complaints so far. The price is a steal for this. I love the thickness and I feel like this mousepad will last me for a pretty long time.
customer_reviews.author: clay

customer_reviews.title: Bad Smell
customer_reviews.text: The smell is quite horrible and it lasts forever it seems like. I don't know if it is the materials or a chemical on the mouse pad that caused me to have a severe allergic reaction on my wrists and the rash/blisters haven't gone away for weeks. If you have sensitive skin, think twice before purchasing budget products.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be much better
customer_reviews.text: Decent extended gaming pad but defective out of the box. Would not lay flat no matter what I tried. The item had a wavy pattern to the edges and the stitching was bad. Wouldn't be that bad but the stitch was right in front of me due to it facing me. Good materials used but the item comes in a box rolled up. This can make for a pad that will not relax from form. I will be returning the item.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Day

customer_reviews.title: Ooh, that smell! IT SMELLS LIKE SHREDDED TIRES AND WD40.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Performs good. Ok. TOO BAD IT SMELLS LIKE A TIRE FACTORY. Like seriously, this thing smells. A lot. You can actually taste it, it's that bad. I'm not kidding. I left it outside for 48 hours to let it gas out, still didn't help. If you're sensitive AT ALL to chemical smells, then avoid this pad. It's overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: AOzzy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for $10
customer_reviews.text: I received this mouse pad just shy of two weeks ago. I've been using it since it came in and I have zero complaints so far. There was that smell that others have mentioned, but I've honestly never had a new mouse pad or wrist support that didn't have that smell. And it was nowhere near as bad as some reviews have made it out to be. I cannot smell it as I'm typing right now with the mouse pad underneath my keyboard and it definitely did not transfer to my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Otter

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough.
customer_reviews.text: After about half a year with this, it seems the left side stitching seems to have given out a bit. Maybe it was always like that and I never noticed. Works great, though gets messy fairly easily. Zowie optical mouse glides nicely and tracks accurately on it. Mat itself sticks to the glass desk pretty well, though sometimes needs adjustment. For the price you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to your desk
customer_reviews.text: I got this on sale and I was pleasantly surprised! The mat is very good quality and doesn't slip at all when placed on my slick desk. I love having my keyboard and mouse both on their own mat. It sounds silly but it really does look better this way. The material works well for gaming or basic work. It's a pretty simple product but it is done very well.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel BosticTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a change of pace from my old SteelSeries mouse pad (that I have since given to my brother), and more room for my mouse so I could play at a lower DPI. Purchased this mat in particular since it perfectly fits on the keyboard/mouse shelf for my desk, and so far, I have no complaints whatsoever. Even after paying for expedited shipping, it's a better value for a mouse mat than most name-brand gaming brand mats, and should hold up just as long.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Allen

customer_reviews.title: Nice, big, basic keyboard/mouse pad
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. They’re a great value for the price. The edges are stitched which is nice. The material isn’t super thick but still provides a good feel. On one part of my desk there is an uneven seam where one of my keyboards would rock a little. This pad stopped the rocking which was and unintended bonus. When they showed up, both pads had an annoying curl because theyre delivered rolled up. But it flattened out sfter a couple days.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S.

customer_reviews.title: Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to get a mat-like thing for keeping my bike from getting damaged when I flip it over, put it under my seat. That way I can work on the wheels and such upside down. This did the trick nicely, and is small enough to take with me for emergency road repairs, but large enough to give me some freedom of moving it around a bit. Overall, easy to clean and carry with. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: PhoenixCodes

customer_reviews.title: Love this mat!
customer_reviews.text: This is it. The pinnacle of gaming pads. This thing is absolutely massive. If you can find a sale on these, pick up two, you won't regret. The straight black with just a small "Pecham" at the bottom right is perfect. No slip, no slide. Amazing quality for the price. Pros: -Great quality -Great aesthetic -Great price -Perfect size
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: Folds Flat, Smooth, Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: Arrived rolled and folded out flat instantly. Mouse rolls smooth and double as a workspace for precise electronic work or any desk hobby that doesn't involve excess heat or sharp objects. Border threading is clean and pad doesn't shift on smooth surfaces Worth the Money and Turns Heads. Great Job on a Great Product
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: I love this. It fits my desk perfectly and gives ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It fits my desk perfectly and gives me a non skid waterproof surface. Wipes clean with a damp rag. My mouse slides so well now that i had to lower the speed setting. The only issue I have with this pad is the smell. It's quite strong. Day three and the smell is still quite strong. I purchased two of these. When I open the second one I will let it air-out some on the patio before using it. Other than that, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: ac1957

customer_reviews.title: Premium
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable mat. Smooth but soft - fabric top. Edges are trimmed nice. Lays flat, stays in place, and fits a full size keyboard with plenty of space for a mouse perfectly. Excellent material for placing your phone on. I had stopped using mouse pads once optical mice took off because mouse pads were always annoying. This mouse pad is top notch and the extra space and smooth mousing made me fall in love. Wish I had this at work
customer_reviews.author: Chris C

customer_reviews.title: Horrible rubber smell even after air out/washing
customer_reviews.text: The smell of this mouse mat is atrocious. When I unrolled it for the first time, a noxious rubbery, car tire smell wafts up and filled the air. It will get better I thought. Wrong. Overtime the smell made me dizzy, I had to stop using it. Even after a whole weeks and a half of leaving the mouse mat outside and washing it the smell still persists. Makes you think about what kind of low quality rubber did they use to make the base of this mouse mat. I paid $8 for the mouse mat. It was a mistake. Not even worth returning. Will throw it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Random Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Simple, function over form. Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Plain black. I love it. Great simple big mouse pad. My desk is very dark brown/almost black so this pad just blends in and still keeps the desk (and my peripherals) in great condition. In the pictures you may not see the logo. That's because I have the pad "upside down" and the logo is located under the keyboard. Again, just going with simple things to make the hardware itself stand out. Great mouse/keyboard pad!
customer_reviews.author: ZZabrisk

customer_reviews.title: Nice price and great mouse pad.
customer_reviews.text: Has both a good mouse feel and is a nice size. If you need a mouse pad that covers this big of a space it is a really good pad for the price. Update: After a fair bit of use this mouse pad does pickup and show dirt quickly and apparently. It can be gently washed but that is also kind of a hassle. If it is on sale it is has some bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: GFX

customer_reviews.title: Have 1 at work, 1 at home. Very nice
customer_reviews.text: My coworker had been talking about getting one of these for months so as I joke I ordered one and put it on my desk at work. Turns out, it's a pretty neat thing to have. No more do I have to worry about pushing the mouse pad around throughout the day, and it also provides a nice little cushion for my wrists. A lot of people say this isn't big enough but it's plenty big for a regular keyboard and mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer of things

customer_reviews.title: Nice thickness/Rubber Bottom/Easy Cleanup
customer_reviews.text: Comes rolled up and looks like it is gonna stay bent, but after putting your keyboard and mouse on it and something on the corners it goes away pretty quickly. Already spilled soda on it and it came off very easily with just a damp rag. I actually mainly use it to have a mouse to the right, Surface Pro in the middle, and phone and other stuff to the left and there is plenty of room. Pretty good thickness and rubber bottom to stop from sliding everywhere, as well as stitched edges which are nice to prevent fraying like other mousepad may do after heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: pugbetty

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my PC desk. Seems durable so far. Only dislike is that it moves pretty easily with a little pressure on my laminated wood desk. It stays pretty much right where it's at with normal use and gaming though. Definitely worth buying over all those overpriced fancy ones.
customer_reviews.author: Slork

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable option.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Very cheap for a nice high quality mousepad. This thing is HUGE. Measure your area if you are unsure. It feels great. I'm coming from a razer vespula and the speed on the mousepad is night and day difference. Only time will tell if the edges and everything else holds up well. This is one of the best feeling mousepads I've owned and I've had many gaming mousepads.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help keep my work desk clean. There's a slight funk when you first open it, but that's gone within a couple days. You'll need to give i a couple days to lay flat. It ships rolled up and one edge stayed slightly curled for a few days. But after that, it will smooth out.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie M. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great size! Cannot believe I waited this long.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a mouse pad because the Magic Mouse does not sit perfectly flat, so when I use it on a hard surface, I can feel the annoying wobble. I took a plunge with this one and didn't have high expectations due to its price, but I love it. You can see in the photo that it comfortably fits my Apple Keyboard, trackpad and the mouse. And it has some space left over. Great. 5 stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: Tsk Tsk Tsk

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth "XXL" mousepad/mat I've owned and is the best so far. It's a bit thinner than the others and I suspect the price is lower as a result, however I've come to prefer it for a couple reasons. It's not as comfortable, but the harder surface is better for precise mouse movements. It also dries much quicker when wiped down or thrown in the laundry, something I do often. Overall, happy with it and would buy again rather than trying yet another brand.
customer_reviews.author: T.Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and yes, washable.
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best mousepad ive had. After one year of constant use, it's only suffered minimal wear. It's indeed machine washable (though you'd really want to air-dry this). Has a pretty high quality feel, especially for the price. I'll be recommending this to everyone. PS: there is that initial rubber stink like users mention. But it was gone in about a day.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Great For Mechanical Keyboards/ High DPI Mice
customer_reviews.text: This is a great base for my mechanical keyboard and a generous space for my mouse beside it. It's served me well for months and whenever it gets dirty I just throw it in the washer and it's good as new. It does take a lot of time for the shape of it rolled up to settle out, but that didn't affect its use at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bahnsen

customer_reviews.title: If I move my keyboard on to the mouse pad completely there's like 10 inches worth of usable mouse pad
customer_reviews.text: It's actually kind of short, I've got half of my keyboard hanging off the end, which is kind of silly if it's supposed to be a mouse pad that's placed under your keyboard. If I move my keyboard on to the mouse pad completely there's like 10 inches worth of usable mouse pad. In hindsight I should have read the measurements, but I wanted to warn people that it's kind of a "small fit" It's cheap tho so that's cool
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Top quality, has held up amazingly well.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for 4 months now, and it's help up surprisingly well. Dirt and "hand cheese" simply wipes right off it with a damp cloth. The stitching around the edges is well done, and hasn't frayed at all. The only con I can think of is the weird "PECHAM" branding in the corner. I'd rather it not have any branding, but this is a small nit pick. An all around top quality product and for the price is an incredible value. I will definitely buy another one when this one wears out, which looks like it's going to take a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Eggbert

customer_reviews.title: This has been so reliable. It comes out black ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been so reliable. It comes out black and clean with just a light, warm washcloth run over the top when I'm cleaning my desk. It holds it's place, and with a full size keyboard + mouse, I have more than enough room for anything I need to do. There are more expensive mats, and I have no idea why you would ever buy one. Never slips, really is waterproof so you don't end up with a damp pad just for placing a drink down. I will say the PECHAM logo will screw with your mouse which is why this gets 4 stars, but I don't find this happening at all frequently - but certainly a design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Washington

customer_reviews.title: Nice for glass topped desks
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use on my glass top desk at home since I tend to wrest my hands along the edge of it, so this softens that up. I suppose if you are a gamer or do digital drawing it's probably nice to have to wrest your hands/wrists on for a little more comfort and to expand the area of your desk you can drag your mouse around on.
customer_reviews.author: BS AZ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Gaming Mouse Pad For The Price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a steal. Great price for a solid pad. I'm currently in the process of upgrading my gaming rig and I really needed a few new accessories as well including a new gaming mouse pad. This stays in place and is of solid quality. It arrived rolled up similar to how a yoga mat would but once I unpacked it, it laid out flat. Great investment.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: It covers my small desk entirely. It's nice to the touch and it looks pretty sturdy, so I don't foresee any damage caused by hand movement friction anytime soon. The name logo could have been placed at the top, instead of at the bottom, those letters will fade out quicker since your wrist is sitting right above. That's not a big deal though. After using this big mouse pad, when I'm at work, using a regular pad, it feels a bit weird, I may get an extra one for my workplace too.
customer_reviews.author: Bera Moose

customer_reviews.title: non slip lego building mat!
customer_reviews.text: Use this as a lego building mat so that the pieces would stay on the table and off the floor. It’s smooth, comfortable, and effective at keeping small pieces still. The black color helps the pieces stand out. For computer work, should be equally nice.
customer_reviews.author: FrugalTechie

customer_reviews.title: One year and well
customer_reviews.text: So I've had this mouse pad for over a year now and I have no complaints about it. The feel has texture to it but still is smooth, the stitching on the sides look just as they came new, and its super easy to clean. But make sure to MEASURE YOUR SETUP! I was off by a few inches, it may not look great when it's off but it's still very nice. I wouldn't trade it for another
customer_reviews.author: Beckett K.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps My Desk Nice.
customer_reviews.text: As I stated in my enthralling review of the coasters I bought, I just refinished the top of my desk with birch and I want to keep it looking good. Just the right size for what I needed. Had a few stray threads so I took off a star. What can I say, I'm picky. I also don't care for the logo. I turned it so the logo is on the upper left, it's upside down now so I don't notice it as much.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Nice, big, cheap pad
